t:
I looked deep into her eyes, trying to comprehend her love for me.



Instead, I only saw gears moving inside her eyes.
c:
I had completely forgotten when I purchased the love-bot.



#eyes #love #gear #machine #heartbreak #girlfriend #comprehend #lovehurts





Inspired by several (short) films, including ‘The Dollmaker’ and ‘Cure for Loneliness’.
